title: Available 1 Bed 1 Bath
posting_body: These apartments feature a living room, dining room, and a kitchen with standard appliances, standard countertops, a dishwasher, and disposal.
This apartment has carpet or wood flooring in the living area, wood flooring in the kitchen and the bathroom(s), with carpet in the bedroom(s).
The bedroom(s) have a closet and the bathroom(s) include a soaking tub.
Features central A/C, central heat, ceiling fans, built-in bookshelves, fireplace, lighting fixtures, and a private patio/balcony with storage.
Full-sized washer/dryer in select units or washer/dryer connections.
Community amenities include a business center, emergency maintenance, fitness center, sundeck, and pool.
Less than a ten-minute commute to I-35.
***Availability and pricing is real-time, can change daily, and varies by lease term***
